name: L30-P4RD
description:
L30-p4rd Is Singleplayer, top-down Shooter


You explore planets as a member of the L30-P4RD, a special force that pioneered planets for civilization.
Grab your gear and select your ability.
Don't die. There's a mission you must have to do.

features


- 20 Distinctive Weapons, 7 Armor
- 3 Classes, 37 passive skills and 15 active skills
- Create your own build using skillpoints that can be used regardless of class
- Simple missions
